<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grand Scroll Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3730) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 47</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Elaborate Scroll Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3720)

</column>

---

You've completed the third and final step in your assimilation of scroll esoterica, granting you daily [scrolls](/equipment/consumables/scrolls) of incredible power. In addition to your daily scrolls from [Scroll Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3713) and Elaborate Scroll Esoterica, add a single scroll with a 6th-level spell. At 20th level, add a scroll with a 7th-level spell.
name: Grand Scroll Esoterica
